body.name: Broom and Dustpan Combo Set,Upright Stand Commercial Dustpan and Heavy Duty Angle Broom,Wide Sweeping Broom with Dustpan Set for Home Room Kitchen Office Lobby Indoor Outdoor Floor Cleaning (Black)

features: 【Broom and Dustpan Combo with Lid】Design with lid - windproof. When you lift, the dustpan will close to prevent garbage from scattering.It provides secure debris collection and easy, hands-free emptying.It is very beautiful and practical.

【Convenient Storage & Save Space】After the cleaning done, fold up broom with stand up dustpan and place it in the corner to save space.Holes at the end of brooms for sweeping outdoor/indoor also allow to hang on the wall or closet.

【Efficient and Easy Cleaning】The dustpan lip is designed with slope is flush with the floor, you clean all trash and debris into the dustpan as you sweep, the dustpan seals to the floor and does not sweep dust underneath as you use it. At the same time, we have installed wheels at the bottom of the dustpan, which makes cleaning easier and saves you valuable time.

【Stainless Steel Long Handle】The broom and dustpan set for home is upgraded with stainless steel long handles. The heavy duty broom is adjustable from 32.6 inches to 57 inches while the dustpan is 47.2 inches.You can adjust height of the broom according to your needs and say goodbye to aching back and knees with our premium stiff bristle broom and dustpan combo.

【3 Layers Special Split-End Stiff Bristles】The stiff bristle broom is made of 3 layers stiff bristles for sweeping heavy things,such as grass, soil, sands, snow, leaves.And the special split-end technology of the bristles is good for pick-up of fine particles, including sugar, salt , crumbs and etc on all hard surfaces.
body.description: Broom with Dustpan Combo Set,Upright Stand Commercial Dustpan and Heavy Duty Angle Broom The dustpan and lobby broom is designed to stand up to the demands of indoor home lobby dormitory use.Long-Lasting bristles broom head has 12.6" sweeping width, 3-layer stiff bristles won’t weaken or break during tough cleaning jobs, resist bending and hold their shape.The dustpan head pivots for easy storage and locks into place when in use for effortless and secure debris collection, emptying and transport.Our heavy duty broom and dustpan combo is your best choice for cleaning! Windproof Dustpan with Lid Stiff Bristles Sturdy Handle Upright Stand

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice sturdy set.
reviews.reviewText: This is a nice and sturdy broom and dustpan set. It feels like it's good quality and durable according to modern standards. It was easy to assemble. The broom has very soft bristles making it perfect for surfaces like hard wood floors, tile etc. The broom handle is a little longer than most which is nice if you're on the taller side, or if you're shorter it will help to reach the ceiling if you use your broom the remove spider webs. It might not be the best option for more commercial use like driveways, sidewalks etc. due to the soft bristles. Personally I would have preferred if the dustpan was open on the top to allow the broom to be stored inside, but the closed top does have certain benefits like preventing dust from blowing out when ceiling fans are on, or windows open. There is a clip on the dp handle to secure the broom which helps with storage.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A great set.
reviews.reviewText: I got these as a replacement for my current broom and dustpan, both of which had seen better days. They were easy to put together, and both feel very durable. The dustpan in particular feels worlds better than the old, cheap one I was using. When stored, it has no problem staying upright. The broom is wonderful too, particularly the bristles. They are FANTASTIC – nice and soft, so it sweeps up the fine dirt as well as the bigger stuff. I love this set, it is a definite upgrade to my previous set. Would definitely treat myself again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Not very sturdy!!
reviews.reviewText: It was easy to put together. The broom isn’t the sturdiest but it gets the job done. The dust pan is perfect and works great as well. Great priced combo set.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Very Bulky Broom and Dustpan Combo Set
reviews.reviewText: The size and bulkiness of both the broom and dustpan make storage a significant challenge. The set takes up an absurd amount of space in my closet, making it inconvenient to stow away. This lack of practicality in terms of storage is a major drawback, especially for those with limited space.Moreover, the weight of the broom and dustpan is surprisingly heavy, making it cumbersome and tiring to use for extended periods. The ergonomic design seems to be an afterthought, as it doesn't provide the comfort and ease of use that one would expect. This makes the whole cleaning process much more laborious than it needs to be.In terms of functionality, the bristles on the broom are not as effective as one would hope. They often leave behind dirt and debris, requiring multiple passes to achieve a satisfactory result. The dustpan, too, seems poorly designed, as it struggles to collect dust and dirt efficiently, leaving a frustrating trail of residue behind.The overall build quality of the Broom and Dustpan Combo Set is questionable. After just a few uses, I noticed signs of wear and tear, with bristles starting to shed and the dustpan showing signs of bending. This lack of durability is a sad look ahead.Its impractical size, uncomfortable design, subpar performance, and questionable durability make it a poor choice for anyone looking for a reliable and efficient cleaning tool. I would strongly advise potential buyers to explore other, more practical options.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars No More Bending to Use a Dustpan!
reviews.reviewText: The Broom and Dustpan Combo came with the handles in 3 pieces and they screw together. There is only one way for them to go together so not having any directions was not a problem as they are not needed. One bag had a label reading it was for the broom, the other had one reading it was for the dust pan. They went together tight and they seem firm enough.The problem I have is the pan 'cover' does not line up with the pan opening. It covers it on one side but then it slants leaving a sizable gap. I checked the 'hinges' and nothing is broken. There is no way for me to straighten this molded plastic. This can be a bit of a problem if light dirt is picked up because when the pan is lifted the dirt/dust can escape without a problem through it. The whole purpose of this pan is keeping the 'dirt' in the pan so I took a star off for 'looks' and one for 'function'.I like the way it stores so easily and stays together with the clip. This lets me store it behind a door and out of sight. I also love not having to keep bending down to use a hand-held dustpan.I do like the broom and pan set and as long as I just happened to get the 'bad cover' and they weren't all manufactured this way, I would recommend it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Rather Big & Bulky
reviews.reviewText: This dust pan went together really well and very easily. Like any broom and dustpan you sweep the dirt and hair and instead of bending over with the dust pan it is easily placed right on the floor. What I don't like about this is that the dustpan itself is very big and bulky so this combo would not be a great choice if you are tiny living or just have a small space. It also does not store very well either because of the dustpans bulkiness.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Have to put together. I love that the dust pan has a long handle so no more bending down to get the dirt. Easy to assemble and easy to use. Love the color and the ease of ordering with fast delivery.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice broom, but the dustpan is lacking
reviews.reviewText: Once I got the handles screwed into place, the broom works great. Unfortunately, the dustpan lid sits wonky and doesn't close properly.
